morphInfos.tenseExplained: it will happen in the future
morphInfos.voiceExplained: it is something one does (similar to Active)
morphInfos.moodExplained: saying that an action actually happens
morphInfos.personExplained: they are people or things being spoken or written about
morphInfos.numberExplained: there are two or more of them
morphInfos.explanation: an action that will happen – by people or things being discussed
